name: Tanky ! Tanky !
description:
Welcome to Tanky! Tanky! It's a game inspired by Battle City.

This is a Third-Personal Shooting game.  Your objective is very simple, Protect your base and destroy all the enemies from level to level. 

Be careful! Get ready for facing various powerful enemies and unique environments at different levels.

Features:

  • Special Shooting System
  • Enemy Diversity
  • Map Diversity (Different types of terrain and obstacles)

Length:  30 mins - 1 hour
